backupVaultName.description: Name of the backup vault to add a lock configuration for.

changeableForDays.description: The number of days before the lock date. If omitted creates a vault lock in `governance` mode, otherwise it will create a vault lock in `compliance` mode.

maxRetentionDays.description: The maximum retention period that the vault retains its recovery points.

minRetentionDays.description: The minimum retention period that the vault retains its recovery points.
